When did California last witness a superbloom before the current one?
four years ago
What caused the historic superbloom in California?
abundance of rainfall
Where has the superbloom occurred in California?
Monterey, San Luis Obispo, and Kern counties
Which desert phenomenon happens after an abundance of rainfall causes dormant seeds to germinate?
superbloom
Which popular location is known for visitors taking selfies with the superbloom?
Antelope Valley California Poppy Reserve
Which mountain range is touched by the San Andreas Fault and has been painted by various wildflower species?
Temblor Range
What is the consequence of heavy foot traffic during a superbloom?
patches of flowers not sprouting in the following year
Which department in California has been working to inform the public about safety and responsibility during the superbloom?
California's Department of Parks and Recreation
What is the slogan used by State Parks director Armando Quintero to encourage responsible superbloom visiting?
Don't Doom the Bloom
What type of flowers typically bloom during a California superbloom?
poppies, mustard, goldfields, and other wildflowers
